QuestData.Title: Call in the Artillery
QuestData.Description: I prefer a stand up honorable fight. These monsters deserve nothing better than to be destroyed by the weapons in our hands. However, this particular situation calls for the use of more powerful measures.$B$BTake this flare and mark each of the four buildings within the Twilight Gate to the southwest. Our cannons will handle the rest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Artillery Flare to target the Northern, Northeastern, Southwestern, and Southern buildings at the Twilight Gate.
QuestData.CompletionText: I need you to go back to the Twilight Gate and mark those buildings for bombardment.
QuestData.RewardText: Thanks to you, our cannoneers hit their marks. Tell me about the situation within the Twilight Gate.
